sentences.sContent: He says the guy who lent Christ his mule on Palm Sunday.
sentences.sContent_eng: He says the guy who lent Christ his mule on Palm Sunday.
sentences.sCn: 他说是在基督复活之后，借给他骡子的那个人。

synos.tran: [脊椎]骡；倔强之人，顽固的人；杂交种动物

words.tran: 顽固的，执拗的；骡子似的

trans.tranOther: an animal that has a  donkey  and a horse as parents
